oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rock House Holiness Church service, 1999 November 26
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of a church service in which all congregants are local. The recording features testimoy by Virgil Porter and preaching by Jason Barnes and Bill Pelfrey.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region, Southern -- Religious life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Glossolalia; Imposition of hands; Lay preaching; Pentecostal preaching; Prayer; Singing -- Religious aspects; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region, Southern; Witness bearing (Christianity)
Barnes, Jason; Dunn, Rayford; Pelfry, Bill; Porter, Virgil; Summerford, Billy
Rock House Holiness Church (Sand Mountain, Ala.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Rock House Holiness Church field recordings, 1996-2004
Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson field recordings, interviews, and photographs
